preferences.name: enablefathomapi
preferences.title: Enable Fathom for Regular Web Pages
preferences.description: Enable Fathom APIs for any regular web page. Fathom will always ask your approval before a page can access any of the Fathom features. If you disable Fathom, web pages will not know that Fathom is installed. The built-in Fathom tools remain always available.

preferences.name: debugtoolupload
preferences.title: Share 'Debug My Connection' Tool Reports
preferences.description: Allow uploading of 'Debug My Connection' tool reports to our secure servers for network research. No data is shared with third parties.

preferences.name: homenetupload
preferences.title: Share 'Homenet Discovery' Tool Reports
preferences.description: Allow uploading of 'Homenet Discovery' tool reports to our secure servers for network research. No data is shared with third parties.

preferences.name: baselineupload
preferences.title: Share Background Monitoring Performance Reports
preferences.description: Allow uploading of background monitoring reports to our secure servers for network research. No data is shared with third parties.
